title: Today’s ‘Quordle’ Answers And Hints For Monday, August 7
description: Looking for some help with today's Quordle words? Some clues and the answers are right here.

title: Dell Technologies & NVIDIA Collaborate On Full-Stack Generative AI Solutions
description: Dell and NVIDIA announced new validated designs for inference systems based on NVIDIA GPUs and software, a services offering, and a new Dell Precision AI workstation.

title: EG.5.1 Nicknamed ‘Eris’ Is New Covid-19 Variant Spreading, Monitored By WHO
description: The World Health Organization (WHO) has listed the EG.5 variants as variants under monitoring (VUM) ever since July 19.

title: Forget The New MacBook Pro, Apple Has Something Much Better
description: With Apple's MacBook Pro on special offer around the internet, is it worth spending your money on a new macOS laptop?

title: Unraveling The Secrets Of Mediterranean Sharks: Critical Research Receives National Geographic Funding
description: Critical shark research project receives $100,000 National Geographic Wayfinder grant to track movements in the Mediterranean.

title: Big Question Looms Over Tesla ‘Highland’ Model 3 Refresh: Price
description: As Tesla readies the next generation of the Model 3, one of the burning questions is price. It's a theme Elon Musk returns to often.

title: New Insights Into The Anti-Aging Properties Of Klotho
description: The Klotho gene has gained increasing attention for its anti-aging properties. A new study finds that the benefits of this circulating hormone extend beyond the brain.

title: Fujifilm Instax Mini 12 Vs Instax Mini 11: What's The Difference?
description: Fujifilm’s Instax Mini 12 is the latest in the company’s phenomenally successful range of instant cameras.

title: When Apple Will Launch iPhone 15 And iPhone 15 Pro: New Date Emerges
description: It looks like the date of the big reveal has suddenly become a lot clearer, and it isn't the date that was previously predicted.

title: For Certain Drugs Medicare Selects For Price Negotiation It May Be A Challenge To Get Deeper Discounts Than Current Rebates
description: For certain drugs Medicare selects for price negotiation it may be difficult to achieve deeper discounts than the rebates these pharmaceuticals currently face.

title: Five Reasons You Should Consider Virtual Tutoring For Your Student
description: Why should I consider virtual tutoring for my child? Answer by Brian Galvin, Chief Academic Officer for Varsity Tutors.

title: Everything We Know About ‘Heartstopper’ Season 3 On Netflix, And Its Release Date
description: Here's what we know about Heartstopper season 3, its release date, and how the Writers and Actors Strike may affect it.

title: It’s Now Clear Diablo 4’s Top Priority Should Be Loadouts
description: Diablo 4 always said that they were trying to blend Diablo 2 and 3’s methods of buildcrafting. In practice that is not very fun.

title: New Apple Leak Reveals Much-Needed iPhone 16 Upgrade
description: Following a report by respected analyst Ming-Chi Kuo, expectations are high for a much-improved camera technology to appear in the iPhone 16.

title: Here’s When Sombra Will Get A Rework And A New Ability In ‘Overwatch 2’
description: Overwatch 2 game director Aaron Keller has revealed when Sombra's rework will go live. The DPS hero is getting a new ability too.

title: ‘Destiny 2’ Players Are Adding Up Content Vault Totals, Free-To-Play Losses
description: There are a number of interesting totals here that show just how much Destiny 2 has lost over the years, both in terms of free-to-play and paid content.

title: Xbox Game Pass May Have More Subscribers Than Apple TV+, Peacock
description: The last time we had subscriber numbers revealed from Microsoft was in January of 2022, 25 million.

title: ‘Baldur’s Gate 3’ Prepared For 100,000 Concurrent Players, They’ve Gotten 700,000
description: Larian’s Swen Vincke posted a tweet yesterday showing the game hitting 500,000 concurrent players, making it the third most played game on all of Steam He said that he told IT to only expect 100,000 concurrents at max.

title: FDA: Frito-Lay Recalls 2 Sizes Of Doritos Nacho Cheese Flavored Tortilla Chips
description: Frito-Lay has issued a voluntary recall of certain lots of its 14.5-ounce and 1-ounce Doritos Nacho Cheese Flavored Tortilla Chips.

title: Nearly Half Of All ‘Overwatch 2’ Heroes Are Getting Balance Changes When The Invasion Season Goes Live
description: Overwatch 2’s big Invasion season starts next week and more than a dozen heroes are getting balance changes. Here's a peek at what's coming.

title: AirTag 2: Apple Is Developing Upgraded Tracker, New Leak Claims
description: A new version of the popular AirTag is in development, with improvements on board, it seems.

title: Prompt Engineering Embraces New Technique Called Skeleton-Of-Thought As Bonus On Chain-Of-Thought Reasoning For Generative AI
description: Newest technique for prompt engineering is known as skeleton-of-thought (SoT), which builds on chain-of-thought for generative AI. Find out all about skeleton-of-thought.

title: Kensington MK7500 Is Probably The Best Programmable Mechanical Keyboard On The Market
description: Kensington's new mechanical keyboards works with macOS and Windows. It's programable and can be customised in so many ways, making it a bespoke keyboard.

title: Elon Musk Says Fight With Mark Zuckerberg Will Be Livestreamed On Twitter
description: Elon Musk announced that his upcoming fight with Meta’s Mark Zuckerberg will be livestreamed on X, the social media platform formerly known as Twitter.

title: Jake Paul Defeats Nate Diaz In A Competitive And Entertaining Scrap
description: Jake Paul did what was expected on Saturday night, but Nate Diaz did not embarrass himself.

title: Elon Musk Says Twitter Will Pay Legal Fees Of Any Users Punished For Posting
description: Elon Musk says he’ll pay the legal fees of anyone who’s been “unfairly treated” by their employer for posting on Twitter, according to a tweet sent late Saturday.

title: Today’s ‘Quordle’ Answers And Hints For Sunday, August 6
description: Looking for some help with today's Quordle words? Some clues and the answers are right here.

title: High Tech Aliens Will Need Goldilocks Levels Of Atmospheric Oxygen, Say Astronomers
description: High levels of atmospheric oxygen here on Earth were key to the long-term development of technology, say astronomers.  But will other Earths be so lucky?
